message: Hi Bob, I'm thrilled to offer you this exclusive product. I believe it will be a great asset for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14500.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm aiming to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $13000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget considerations, I believe the product's value to you is higher. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13750?
